review:
Good doctor with great experience in the field. 
Consoles the patient and makes them feel comfortable with procedure. 

Highly recommended

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Myself and my wife, we visited the Dr Madhavi Latha with some gynaec problems. We are very happy with the treatment from the doctor. She not only listens to the patients fully, but also gives high attention to the each and every detail of the problems. She interacts with patients thoroughly to understands and diagnose the problem. She always prefers to prescribe the generic medicines (low cost medicines) and avoids highly priced brands. She explains about each and every medication on the prescription and its dosage. She calls for next visits only if it is required. I definitely recommend this doctor. Finally, she definitely gives some time for the patients to speak and counsel them if required. She is always available via clinic and hospital. I referred this doctor to many of my colleagues.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: she was very rude, had visited for atleast 3 times and everytime she seems irritated, not at all polite I never recommend her to anyone

tags: Treatment satisfaction,
review:
1. I had a deficiency of b-12 *** *** *********** ******** *** * ** *** I was diagnosed for pcod , she refused to give treatment and asked me to wait till my pregnancy .
** ***** ** * **** ******* * **** ** *** ***** ** ******* **** ********* * ****** *** ******* ** ******* *********** ** ***** ** * ******* *
3. Pcod has pyschological aspects related to it like extreme mood swings and depression . She asked me to consult pyschiatrist for the same but the real issue is my pyschiatrist asked me to consult gynecologist for my pcod treatment so that my mood swings and depression will also be cured , *** **** ******* *** ************* ******* ** *** ****** **4.dont visit her at the Apollo clinic , she doesn't give a care about it . She is more concerned towards her own clinic

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: She is a doctor who doesn't ignore the smallest of a risk she foresees. She makes it a point to address all the issues the patient puts out to her. I've consulted her throughtout my pregnancy and she was so kind enough to answer all my points. She explains every tablet she prescribes and also a very good thing is, she mostly goes with medicines from standard companies rather than going with local brands. I had couple of emergencies in my pregnancy and she attended me in no time. She did my delivery as well and that was a pretty smooth and easy experience. Overall, we had a great experience and can confidently say that you are in safe hands if with Dr. Madhavilatha.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I can't forget how responsible she was,she was there with me although my pregnancy journey.She has delivered my baby.,and when I had uterine haemorrhage amid the C-section,she tackled it like a Pro. I have got the courage only because of her at those tough times.Am all the way to hyd to deliver my second baby with her help and support.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: We visited for our 2nd pregnancy case. ...Dr. Madhvi Latha handled our first pregnancy too which was complicated and brought to her quite late...she did really well...our kid has now turned 6 and is healthy and energetic. We are very satisfied and happy with her fine sense of treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Due to pandamic I don't want to visit any clinic. In Practo I booked consultation with Dr.Madhavi Garu....she is very patient friendly she listened to my problem very patiently and she suggested good medication.When I went for the scan the problem was the same what she told me.

review: The doctor is extremely unfriendly. *** ***** ***** *** **** *** ** ******* *** *** ******* ** **** **** ********** ** ********** ** ********** I went for advise on better contraceptive methods and the the solution provided was to not have sex as I was unmarried. That was the best solution according to her. It was not a good experience at all.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I consulted  Dr. Madhavi Latha for pregnancy confirmation for the first time. We were very much happy with her responses for all our queries. She is very friendly and she listens to the patients with very much patience. She explains " each capsule/medicine for what purpose" and disease causes and preventions. We are so much happy and satisfied with her treatment. 
 Recently we blessed with a beautiful baby girl. Thank you so much... mam.
